name: up-fetch
description: Advanced fetch client builder for typescript.

scripts.release:pre:beta: git pull && node scripts/check-beta-version.js && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.release:pre:stable: git pull && node scripts/check-stable-version.js && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.release:stable: npm run release:pre:stable && npm publish && npm run release:post
scripts.release:beta: npm run release:pre:beta && npm publish --tag beta && npm run release:post
scripts.release:post: git add . && git commit -a && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags && git push

author: Laurent Blondy
